DOC.brief_summary: Motus Gl is developing a single-use device that attaches to a standard colonoscope, thereby integrating colon cleansing, screening and treatment into one procedure. The device creates turbulence within the colon using water jets. The colon's fecal fluids are evacuated by the system.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Motus Gl CleanUp System During Screening Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Subjects in the age range of 5069 years Subjects who are considered for routine screening colonoscopy Subjects with BMI within the range of 18.530 Subject is willing to sign informed consent form History of G diseases or history of Colorectal cancer (personal or family) Previous major abdominal surgeries Medical status ASA grater or equal to 3 Acute Gl symptoms, such as bleeding, unexplained weight loss, inflammatory bowel disease (lBD).
